details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 5 Version identification - rev property
details.description: The value of "pdfuaid:rev" shall be the four digit year

rule.description: The value of "pdfuaid:rev" shall be the four digit year

error.message: The value of "pdfuaid:rev" (%1) not the four digit year
